title: Windows 7 AIO x86 x64 [EN] [SP1.IE11.June.2015-NiKKA]

Info:

Source: M$ ISOs

Type: System, x86 - 32bit, x64 - 64bit
Language: English
Volume: 1xDVD9, bootable ISO, bootable USB
Create Date: 2015.06.27
Release Date: 2015.06.27
By: NiKKA


Contents:
- Integrated updates up to 2015.06
- Integrated Internet Explorer 11
- KB2533552 & DirectX are installed by setupcomplete.cmd
- NET 4.5.2 optionally to installation on WU or look in ADDONS folder
- 7 versions 32bit to install: STARTER, HOMEBASIC, HOMEPREMIUM,
  PROFESSIONAL, ULTIMATE, PROFESSIONAL VL, ENTERPRISE
- 6 versions 64bit to install: HOMEBASIC, HOMEPREMIUM,
  PROFESSIONAL, ULTIMATE, PROFESSIONAL VL, ENTERPRISE
- You can install with your original key


Instruction:

Size ISO: 6,59 GB (bytes: 7Ã‚Â 084Ã‚Â 632Ã‚Â 064)
MD5  ISO: 6c4517bb3b90ae2a470047484cc1ac76

Burn ISO on DVD (DVD9) or mount in daemon or VMware or prepare bootable USB (8GB minimum):
Use: Rufus or other progz, or make manualy bootable USB:

How prepare bootable USB to install Windows Vista, 7, 8, 8.1:

WARNING! You do this at your own risk! Further steps delete the contents of the USB drive!
Make a copy of the earlier if you need to!

console => cmd [enter]
diskpart [enter...]

list disk
select disk [select your disk USB - carefully!]
clean
create partition primary
select partition 1
active
format fs=ntfs quick
assign

exit
exit

copy whole DVD/.ISO on USB
install system


Activation - read info in activation.txt or activation_VL.txt

In EXTRAS folder:
- DirectX v9.29.1974 (as you need to reinstall)
- NET Framework 4.5.2 32bit_64bit EN (2015.06)
- NET4.5.2 with setupcomplete

UEFI Boot Win7AIO:
AIO version does not support UEFI Boot.
Recovery mode is x86 - 32bit (32bit must be in AIO). If you want to install in UEFI mode, download a separate version of x64 - 64bit.

Win10 compatibility check/telemetry updates are not integrated:
- KB2952664
- KB2990214
- KB3021917
- KB3035583
- KB3068708
- KB3050265
These and other, newer, new - will be on Windows Update.

P.S. Do not remove pendrive/DVD during the installation until it is fully installed - get a working desktop.


System settings unchanged. Integrated via Slipstream. Mastering via scripts (DISM, IMAGEX, OSCDIMG, CMD)
